entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
